meanings.definition: A person who serves on a submarine.
meanings.sent1: The submariner navigated the underwater vessel with skill.
meanings.sent2: The submariner received specialized training for submarine operations.
meanings.sent3: The submariner accidentally bumped into the periscope while trying to get a better view.
meanings.sent4: She was a submariner in the sea of paperwork, diving deep into each document.
meanings.sent5: The submariner's bravery in the depths of the ocean was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The submariner technology advanced rapidly over the years.
meanings.sent2: The navy conducted submariner exercises to test the new equipment.
meanings.sent3: The submariner design of the submersible was sleek and efficient.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a vast, submariner world of underwater exploration.
meanings.sent5: The submariner mission was to explore the uncharted depths of the ocean.
